attributes.action: ban on single use disposable vapes to protect our children.
attributes.additional_details:
Single use disposable vapes became a trend among teenager and children.
Protect our youth but also our planet by avoiding millions of plastic/lithium vapes littered every week.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to sell or use disposable e-cigarettes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638536
